cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with a submodular maximization problem with a knapsack constraint, which is a well-studied problem in the field of combinatorial optimization (cs.DS). The problem is applied to news and scientific literature recommendation, which falls under information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed algorithm is a streaming algorithm, which is a common technique in machine learning and data mining (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the approximation ratio of the algorithm, which is a common topic in theoretical computer science (cs.SI). Finally, the paper proposes a novel algorithm for solving the problem, which involves optimization techniques and heuristics, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
